DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess efficacy safety 12 week treatment ABT-493/ABT-530 combination regimen adults chronic HCV genotype 1 - 6 infection chronic renal impairment .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Efficacy Safety ABT-493/ABT-530 Renally Impaired Adults With Chronic Hepatitis C Virus Genotype 1 - 6 Infection
